title: COVID-19 Meeting Closures
innerHTML: Due to COVID-19, several meetings are NOT meeting at this time. Please call the area helpline for help finding a meeting (502)-569-1769

title: Online Meetings Now Available
innerHTML: Several local NA memebers have started online meetings to help meetings continue during COVID-19 concerns. 502 area has a list of these online meetings on their website, please click here to see a list of online meetings available now
